definition: deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: I think that's why there are only isolated cases of dismissals or ill treatment towards Filipinos.
sentences.chinese: 我想這爲只僱和虧待菲律賓人的事件。

sentences.english: Romans often made resolutions to ask for forgiveness from a person they had wronged.
sentences.chinese: 當時羅馬人常下決心要請曾被他們虧待的人原諒他們。

sentences.english: Trinity had never been unkind to me.
sentences.chinese: 三一學院從未虧待過我。

sentences.english: Maltreat what, don't also maltreat oneself.
sentences.chinese: 虧待什麼，也別虧待了自己。

sentences.english: Maltreat what, don't also maltreat oneself.
sentences.chinese: 虧待什麼，也別虧待了自己。

sentences.english: Christ mentioned this when pointing out what they had done to the commandment regarding parents (v. 9).
sentences.chinese: 基督指出他們如何虧待父母，就是一個明確的事例。
放心吧，我不會虧待你的。

sentences.english: She always grumbles to me about how badly treated at work.
sentences.chinese: 她總是向我抱怨她在工作中如何被虧待。

sentences.english: The UK citizens still appear to be being short-changed.
sentences.chinese: 英國市民似乎仍然在受到虧待。
